# ğŸ  House Price Prediction App

This project predicts house prices using a **baseline Linear Regression model**.

## Features
- Area
- Bedrooms
- Bathrooms
- Stories
- Parking
- Furnishing status
- Amenities (AC, basement, etc.)

## Tech Stack
- Python
- Pandas
- Scikit-learn
- Streamlit

## How to Run
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
streamlit run app.py
